name.ja: <ruby>白銀の城の執事<rt>ラビュリンス・バトラー</rt></ruby> アリアス

text.en: During the Main Phase (Quick Effect): You can send this card from your hand or field to the GY; from your hand, either Special Summon 1 "Labrynth" monster, or Set 1 Normal Trap. That Set card can be activated this turn. When your opponent activates a card or effect in response to the activation of your "Labrynth" card or effect, except "Labrynth Butler Arias", or your Normal Trap Card or effect, while this card is in your GY (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon this card. You can only use each effect of "Labrynth Butler Arias" once per turn.
